# Loading Spatial data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}

setwd("/data/10x_data/10x_visium/")
source("00.import.R")

hip142078 <- Load10X_Spatial(data.dir = "/data/10x_data/000-notebooks/visium/142078-spatial-hippo")

#ribo.genes <- grep(pattern = "^Rp[sl]", x = rownames(data))
#mito.genes <- grep(pattern = "^mt-", x = rownames(data))
#data <- data[-c(ribo.genes,mito.genes),]

VlnPlot(hip142078, features = c("nCount_Spatial","nFeature_Spatial"), pt.size = 0.1) + NoLegend() + ggtitle("hip142078 nCount_Spatial")
SpatialFeaturePlot(hip142078, features = c("nCount_Spatial","nFeature_Spatial"), max.cutoff = 30000, pt.size.factor = 2) + 
  theme(legend.position = "right") + 
  ggtitle("hip142078 nCount_Spatial")

```

# Quality control, no filtration

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=6, fig.width=16}

mito.genes <- grep(pattern = "^mt-", x = rownames(hip142078@assays$Spatial), value = TRUE)
dropouts <- Matrix::colSums(hip142078@assays$Spatial@data == 0)/nrow(hip142078@assays$Spatial)
ribo.genes <- grep(pattern = "^Rp[sl]", x = rownames(hip142078@assays$Spatial), value = TRUE)
percent.mito <- Matrix::colSums(hip142078@assays$Spatial[mito.genes, ])/Matrix::colSums(hip142078@assays$Spatial)
percent.ribo <- Matrix::colSums(hip142078@assays$Spatial[ribo.genes, ])/Matrix::colSums(hip142078@assays$Spatial)
hip142078[['percent.mito']] <- percent.mito
hip142078[['percent.ribo']] <- percent.ribo
hip142078[['dropouts']] <- dropouts

VlnPlot(hip142078, features = c("nFeature_Spatial", "nCount_Spatial","dropouts","percent.ribo","percent.mito"), ncol=5, cols = "lightsteelblue3") + ggtitle("hip142078")

```

# SCTransform normalization and clustering

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}

hip142078 <- SCTransform(hip142078, assay = "Spatial", verbose = FALSE)
hip142078 <- RunPCA(hip142078, assay = "SCT", verbose = FALSE)
hip142078 <- RunUMAP(hip142078, reduction = "pca", dims = 1:30)
hip142078 <- FindNeighbors(hip142078, reduction = "pca", dims = 1:30)
hip142078 <- FindClusters(hip142078, verbose = FALSE, resolution = 0.4)

DimPlot(hip142078, reduction = "umap", label = TRUE) + ggtitle("hip142078")
SpatialDimPlot(hip142078, label = TRUE, label.size = 3, pt.size.factor = 2) + ggtitle("hip142078")

```

# Clusters re-labelling

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}


new.cluster.ids <- c("Midbrain","Hippocampus area","Isocortex-1","Isocortex-2","Olfactory area","Fiber tracts","Retrosplenial area", "CA1/CA2", "Isocortex-2", "Thalamus", "Hypothalamus", "CA3", "DG", "Outside")
names(x = new.cluster.ids) <- levels(x = hip142078)
hip142078 <- RenameIdents(object = hip142078, new.cluster.ids)

my_levels <- c("Midbrain","Hippocampus area","Isocortex-1","Isocortex-2","Olfactory area","Fiber tracts","Retrosplenial area","CA1/CA2","Thalamus","Hypothalamus","CA3","DG","Outside")
# Relevel object@ident
hip142078@active.ident <- factor(x = hip142078@active.ident, levels = my_levels)

SpatialDimPlot(hip142078, label = TRUE, label.size = 3, pt.size.factor =1.5) + ggtitle("hip142078")

```

# Gene Markers Heatmap

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=10, fig.width=10 }

DefaultAssay(object = hip142078) <- "SCT"
hip142078 <- ScaleData(object = hip142078, verbose = FALSE)
markers <- FindAllMarkers(object = hip142078, only.pos = TRUE)
top <- markers %>% group_by(cluster) %>% top_n(5, avg_logFC)
DoHeatmap(hip142078, features=top$gene, size=3.5)

write.table(markers, file="./output/hip142078.markers.csv", sep=",")

```

# Correlation between clusters

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=6, fig.width=8}

hip142078@meta.data$ClusterName <- hip142078@active.ident

mnmat <- c()
uniq <- unique(hip142078@active.ident)
for(i in 1:length(uniq)){
  mnmat <- cbind(mnmat, apply(as.matrix(hip142078@assays$SCT@data[, hip142078@meta.data$ClusterName==uniq[i]]), 1, mean))
}

colnames(mnmat) <- as.vector(unique(hip142078@active.ident))
ct=cor(mnmat)
pheatmap(ct)

```

# Integration of external data (Zeisel et al., Cell, 2018) (http://mousebrain.org/downloads.html) (8k cells downsampling)

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=6, fig.width=8}

#zeisel <- readRDS("/data/10x_data/10x_mouseatlas/sub8k.rds")
#head(zeisel@meta.data)
#zeisel <- SCTransform(zeisel, ncells = 3000, verbose = FALSE) %>% RunPCA(verbose = FALSE) %>% RunUMAP(dims = 1:30)
#saveRDS(zeisel, "./output/zeisel.rds")

zeisel <- readRDS("./output/zeisel.rds")
anchors <- FindTransferAnchors(reference = zeisel, query = hip142078, normalization.method = "SCT")

```

## Prediction based on metadata field "Region"

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=8, fig.width=14}

DefaultAssay(zeisel) <- "SCT"
DimPlot(zeisel, group.by = "Region", label = TRUE)
predictions.assay <- TransferData(anchorset = anchors, refdata = zeisel$Region, prediction.assay = TRUE,  weight.reduction = hip142078[["pca"]])
hip142078[["predRegion"]] <- predictions.assay
DefaultAssay(hip142078) <- "predRegion"

```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=8, fig.width=10}

DotPlot(hip142078, features = sort(rownames(hip142078@assays$predRegion@data))) + RotatedAxis()

hip142078 <- FindSpatiallyVariableFeatures(hip142078, assay = "predRegion", features = rownames(hip142078@assays$predRegion@data), r.metric = 5, slot = "data", selection.method = "markvariogram")
top.clusters <- head(SpatiallyVariableFeatures(hip142078), 4)

SpatialFeaturePlot(hip142078, features = top.clusters, pt.size.factor = 1, ncol = 2, alpha = c(0.1, 1))

```
